attributes.additional_details:
We have been having issues getting planning permission to hold this event over the past two years, this year would have the fourteenth year if our local council Stockport MBC had granted us use of a site, this petition is asking for SMBC to please support us in the use of a suitable site for 2015.

We are all unpaid volunteers who organise this event for the people of Stockport. We raise money for our 3 charities – to date over £60,000
